column4: Hi all I've just got my first linux install up. Was wondering if anyone could recommend a good place to go looking for apps? I dont want anything in particular but if I see something I like I want to try and install it for practive
til you get a handle on things, i'd stick w/ programs that are in the repositories.
Im installed apache, mysql, php, phpmyadmin, phpsysinfo, torrentflux I dont know what else to try that may be cool
